name: Tekkaman Blade
summary: Uchū no Kishi: Tekkaman Blade (a different game than the SNES Tekkaman Blade game) is a 2D side-scrolling platform game, based on the Tekkaman anime series, where the player controls a mech and must find the exit to each level. The mech only has one melee weapon, but it can also use a special grappling hook, like in Ninja Gaiden Shadow, which is necessary to go through the levels. After the platforming part of the levels, the mech fights against a boss.
